constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of L shape rear dormer with removal of party wall chimney stack installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion and associated changed to fenestration.
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.The applicant engaged with the Council's pre-application advice service and was advised on what changes could be made to address the concerns raised with the previous refusal of planning permission. This advice has not been followed. On reviewing the current planning application Officers contacted the applicant raising concerns and offered the applicant an opportunity to amend the proposals. However, the applicant chose to progress with the current scheme.
For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Removal of existing roof in rear courtyard. Fenestration alteration.'
